title: Innovative Marketing Tool for Corporate Publishing
abstract: Finally! New "corporate publishing" tool automates the process of reusing creative elements to quickly create new sales collateral — for virtually any channel. Tool allows for creativity and flexibility — yet maintains and guarantees brand compliance. It reduces the creation of new collateral to mere minutes and reuse eliminates need for countless legal (re)approvals. This session is perfect for publishers involved with custom content and brand marketers from any organization.
